Package com.metal.kit.vapor.characters

Class Gun

java.lang.Object
com.metal.kit.vapor.characters.Weapon
com.metal.kit.vapor.characters.Gun
public class Gun extends Weapon
Represents a gun-type weapon (such as a pistol, rifle, etc.) in the game. The Gun class extends Weapon and represents a weapon with a method to be used. The use() method is currently defined but needs to be implemented to perform specific actions when the weapon is used (e.g., firing a projectile).

  • Constructor Details

    • Gun

      public Gun(String name, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, float x, float y, int damage, String shootSound)
      Constructs a new Gun object.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the weapon (e.g., "Pistol", "Rifle").
      texture - The texture that represents the appearance of the weapon.
      x - The X position of the weapon in the game world.
      y - The Y position of the weapon in the game world.
      damage - The damage dealt by the weapon when it is used.
      shootSound - The path to the sound file that plays when the gun is fired.

  • Method Details

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Disposes of the resources used by the gun, including its texture and sound.

      This method is called when the weapon is no longer in use to release the allocated memory.

      Overrides:
      dispose in class Weapon

    • use

      public void use()
      Uses the gun, triggering the firing action and playing the associated sound.

      In this implementation, using the gun consists solely of playing the shoot sound. This method can be extended to include additional effects such as firing a projectile, animating the gun, or inflicting damage on enemies.

      Specified by:
      use in class Weapon
